risersText: Muri iyi myaka 10 iheze,Bolivia na Nicaragua nivyo vyateye imbere cane
fallersText: Kuva mu 2005, Croatie na Sri Lanka biri mu biza hasi cane
earningsDescrip: Kw'ifaranga ryose {{currencySymbol}}{{maleEarningsFigure}} umugabo ahembwa mu gihugu cawe, umugore akora akazi nk'ako nyene ahembwa {{currencySymbol}}{{femaleEarningsFigure}}
earningsFooter: Wari uzi ko muri Amerika ku rugero abagore bakore indwi zibiri buri mwaka badahembwa ugereranije n'abagabo?
employmentDescrip: Urugero rw'abagore n'abagabo bakora canke bariko bararondera akazi
employmentFooter: Wari uzi ko ku bihugu 145,bine vyonyene aho abagore ari benshi mu kazi gusunba abagabo  biri muri Africa? Ivyo ni Malawi, Mozambique, Rwanda n'Uburundi
